pkgmetadata.longdescription: Projection Pursuit Regression Tree Visualization // It was developed as a tool for exploring 'PPTreereg' (Projection Pursuit TREE of REGression). It uses various projection pursuit indexes and 'XAI' (eXplainable Artificial Intelligence) methods to help understand the model by finding connections between the input variables and prediction values of the model. The 'KernelSHAP' (Aas, Jullum and Lland (2019) arXiv:1903.10464) algorithm was modified to fit PPTreereg, and some codes were modified from the 'shapr' package (Sellereite, Nikolai, and Martin Jullum (2020) doi:10.21105/joss.02027). The implemented methods help to explore the model at the single instance level as well as at the whole dataset level. Users can compare with other machine learning models by applying it to the 'DALEX' package of 'R'.
